features: CETAPHIL DAILY HYDRATING LOTION FOR COMBINATION SKIN: Instantly hydrates and locks in moisture for 24 hours to protect skin from dryness
IMMEDIATE AND INTENSE HYDRATION: Hyaluronic acid and powerful moisturizing agents provide long lasting hydration
FAST ABSORBING, LIGHTWEIGHT FORMULA: Non-greasy moisturizer won't clog pores
NO ADDED FRAGRANCE AND HYPOALLERGENIC: Clinically tested to be gentle on combination, sensitive skin
DESIGNED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating
TRAVEL SIZE LOTION: This product is under 3.4 fl oz, making it easy to take with you on your next vacation or trip
body.description: CETAPHIL Daily Hydrating Lotion with hyaluronic acid provides immediate and intense 24 hour hydration for combination skin. This face lotion contains a combination of powerful moisturizing agents, including hyaluronic acid, to rehydrate the skin and lock in moisture for instant hydration. The lightweight formula is ideal for use under makeup and is non-comedogenic, providing long lasting hydration without clogging pores, making it suitable for acne prone skin. Hypoallergenic and with no added fragrance, this daily lotion is dermatologist tested and clinically proven to be gentle and non-irritating, even for the most sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CETAPHIL Daily Oil Free Hydrating Lotion contains a unique combination of moisturizers to instantly protect the skin from dryness. This hydrating lotion absorbs quickly to lock in moisture, and lasts 24 hours to keep your skin soft and hydrated throughout the day. Hyaluronic acid is a powerful moisturizing agent and an essential component of skin, known for its ability to retain up to 1000 times its weight in water. This substance helps your skin cells and connective tissues retain water for immediate and intense hydration. This gentle formula is fragrance free and hypoallergenic, designed to be effective yet non-irritating. CETAPHIL Daily Oil Free Hydrating Lotion is dermatologist tested and clinically proven to be suitable for everyday use on sensitive skin.

Sensitive Skin Loves Cetaphil CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL moisturizers deliver long lasting hydration to replenish and protect the skin's moisture barrier from dryness. CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022

STEPS FOR A SENSITIVE SKIN CARE ROUTINE WITH CETAPHIL Cleanse skin with a gentle yet effective cleanser morning and night Ideal for normal to oily skin, CETAPHIL Daily Facial Cleanser removes excess surface oils, dirt and makeup, providing a deep clean without stripping skin of its essential oils or leaving the skin tight or overly dry. Immediately follow with a facial moisturizer to lock in hydration After cleansing, quickly follow with CETAPHIL Daily Oil Free Hydrating Lotion with hyaluronic acid to immediately hydrate and lock in vital moisture. During the day, it is also recommended to use a facial SPF moisturizer with sun protection such as CETAPHIL Daily Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 to deliver nourishing hydration that locks in vital moisture and protects your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Apply a moisturizer at night to help your skin rehydrate, renew and repair Skin cells do their greatest renewal and repair while you sleep at night, yet skin loses more water at night. Using a moisturizer before bed such as CETAPHIL Daily Oil-Free Hydrating Lotion with hyaluronic acid helps boost skin’s moisture reserves and protect skin from dryness throughout the night so that the skin looks and feels refreshed. Complete your combination skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily facial skin care routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your skin type will help to leave your sensitive skin feeling refreshed and balanced.

Gentle Makeup Removing Wipes Daily Facial Cleanser Daily Facial Moisturizer SPF 35 Daily Oil-Free Hydrating Lotion Hydrating Eye Gel Cream Skin Care Benefit Convenient cloths that effortlessly remove waterproof makeup and gently cleanses skin Gentle face wash that removes excess surface oils, dirt and makeup to leave skin feeling refreshed and healthy Lightweight, oil-free lotion with SPF 35 hydrates while protecting skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays Lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that provides immediate and intense hydration Unique gel-cream quickly absorbs to hydrate, brighten and smooth under eye area Skin type Sensitive skin / All skin types Sensitive skin / Combination to oily skin Sensitive skin / Combination Skin Sensitive skin / Combination skin Sensitive skin / All skin types Key ingredients Aloe Vera, Chamomile and Green Tea Glycerine ProVitamin B5 & antioxidants blend, Avobenzone 3%, Octocylene 10% and Glycerin Hyaluronic Acid Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Chamomile extract, Green Tea extract and Licorice Root extract Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't clog pores (Non-comedogenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance-free ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lotion has been great for my face!
reviews.reviewText: The Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion is a skincare gem that I've come to rely on daily. It's incredibly lightweight and absorbs quickly into my skin, leaving it feeling hydrated and refreshed. The addition of hyaluronic acid is a game-changer, as it provides an extra boost of moisture, making it perfect for my dry skin. What sets it apart is that it's non-greasy and doesn't clog pores, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. I appreciate that it's fragrance-free and doesn't irritate my skin. It's become an essential part of my skincare routine, and I love how it keeps my face feeling soft and moisturized throughout the day. Cetaphil has once again delivered a stellar product that I highly recommend for anyone in search of a reliable daily facial moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cetaphil Hydrating Lotion has become a staple in my skincare routine. Its lightweight formula absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling moisturized without any greasiness. As someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate its gentle nature, and it hasn't caused any irritation. The hydration lasts throughout the day, making it perfect for both morning and night use. While it may not have a fancy scent, its simplicity is what makes it effective. Overall, a reliable choice for anyone seeking a no-nonsense, hydrating lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I am always hesitant to try new products on my face because I break out so easily. Since this product is oil free, I thought I would give it a try. I did not suffer any ill effects. Very smooth to apply with no greasy feel. I now use this twice a day, and love the way it feels on my skin..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No strong smell
reviews.reviewText: Very gentle on skinI need to reapply because I think I need a heavier formula for my aging skin.Seems like a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Cetaphil is exactly what I was looking for. I got tired of paying for other needlessly expensive options and wanted to see if I could find what I wanted at a more reasonable price. This is it.I wanted a simple, fragrance-free, oil-free moisturizer to keep my face moisturized, and I could not be happier with this. I have a skin condition which gives me a lot of problems if it gets too dry but I hate the feel of putting a bunch of goopy, slimy crap on my face. This moisturizer is very light; almost watery (as it should be because it’s oil-free), and is absorbed by my skin almost immediately with no mess or gross sliminess. I’ll be buying this as long as they sell it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great basic moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have kind of mixed skin texture. It gets dry but also oily really quickly. This lotion feels super light weight on skin while being very hydrating. I originally tried it because my sister uses it and she has SUPER sensitive skin and is very prone to break outs but this lotion has been a lifesaver. 100% would recommend to add to your skincare routine .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and hydrating!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion for my face for several weeks now, and it has become a fundamental part of my daily skincare routine. This product stands out for its gentle formula, effective hydration, and suitability for a range of skin types, especially those with sensitive skin.One of the most impressive aspects of this lotion is its lightweight texture. Unlike many other moisturizers, it doesn't feel heavy or greasy on the skin. It absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling soft and smooth without any residue. This makes it ideal for use under makeup or as a standalone moisturizer.The hydration provided by Cetaphil's lotion is long-lasting and effective. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, it helps retain natural moisture, keeping my skin hydrated throughout the day. I've noticed a significant reduction in dry patches and an overall improvement in my skin's texture since I started using it.Suitable for sensitive skin, this lotion is fragrance-free, non-comedogenic, and hypoallergenic. I have not experienced any irritation or breakouts, which is a common issue for me with other facial moisturizers. This reassurance makes it a go-to choice for those with sensitive or acne-prone skin.Cetaphil’s commitment to simple and beneficial ingredients is evident in this product. It's free from harsh chemicals and irritants, focusing instead on elements that promote skin health and hydration.The packaging is practical and user-friendly. The pump dispenser is hygienic and dispenses just the right amount of product, minimizing waste and ensuring easy application.In terms of value, while Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion is slightly pricier than some drugstore moisturizers, its effectiveness and gentle formula justify the cost. A little goes a long way, so the bottle lasts a considerable amount of time.The only potential downside is that it may not be sufficient for extremely dry skin types, especially in harsher weather conditions. In such cases, additional moisturizing products might be necessary.In summary, Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion for Face is an excellent product for anyone seeking a gentle, effective, and non-irritating moisturizer. Its lightweight formula, combined with its hydrating and skin-friendly ingredients, makes it a suitable choice for a wide range of skin types, particularly those with sensitive skin. It offers a simple yet effective solution for daily skin hydration and care.
